title: Creative Foundations
description: Began a lifelong creative and technical journey through music and audio. Developed a hands-on understanding of sound, production, and media technology—skills that later shaped an intuitive grasp of technology,systems, and design.

title: Music Industry & Production Management
description: Worked across high-stakes live events, music startups, and Fortune 500 entertainment companies. From touring and supporting major productions to managing crews and logistics, or slinging merchandise (🤘🏼👕🎤), I coordinated with vendors and artists while developing strong leadership and problem-solving skills in fast-paced environments.

title: Product & Data Operations
description: Served as Associate Product Manager overseeing data pipelines, product integrity, and cross-team communication. Supported web and sales platforms through data cleaning, dashboard creation, and process automation—bridging product, operations, and tech.

title: Transition to Technology
description: Self-directed transition into software development, followed by an intensive bootcamp focused on modern web technologies and full-stack projects. Consulted for multiple clients to design and build websites and applications, combining creative problem-solving with analytical thinking to guide them through the development lifecycle and deliver effective, goal-driven solutions.

title: Software Development & Engineering
description: Full-stack developer focused on scalable, maintainable, and visually refined websites and apps. Experienced with React, Next.js, Node.js, AI Integration, and Automation Workflows. Currently working with Wordpress, PHP, SCSS, Vanilla JS/CSS and more. Integrating design awareness, production discipline, and leadership maturity.
